world_setting.world_overview: Across the vast Milky Way galaxy, human civilization is divided into two major powers: 地球联合国 and 人类联邦. 地球联合国 is wealthy and xenophilic but decadent with low administrative capacity; 人类联邦 is militarily powerful but xenophobic with many enemies. Currently, 地球联合国 has been raided by an alien force, causing an entire stellar region to fall. This alien force previously had limited contact with 地球联合国, possesses greater military strength than 地球联合国 but less economic power, and uses 禁忌科技. The capital of 人类联邦 is located in the 天津四 star system, originating from colony ships launched during the early establishment of 地球联合国, which reached the 天津四 star system on the other side of the galaxy through a wormhole, enduring a difficult founding period, with a culture that heavily incorporates elements from the Han Empire and Roman Republic.

natural_law_basis.physical_laws: Follows realistic interstellar physics, gravitational variations in different stellar regions, light speed as communication limit

natural_law_basis.spacetime_rules: At galactic scale, faster-than-light travel relies on wormhole jumps

natural_law_basis.basic_life_forms: Humans dominate, alien species (including but not limited to the forces invading 地球联合国) are hostile powers

temporal_dimension_basis.time_measurement: Continues Earth standard years, extending to Galactic Year 3500 (corresponding to Earth Year 33XX)

temporal_dimension_basis.life_cycle_concept: Human lifespan around 150-200 years (due to advanced medicine), technology improves but natural limits remain

temporal_dimension_basis.historical_recording: Interstellar databases are the main recording medium, historical records differ between powers

supernatural_laws.special_ability_system: No supernatural abilities, advanced technology simulates similar effects

supernatural_laws.special_life_rules: Some alien species have life forms vastly different from humans, but still follow scientific laws

supernatural_laws.critical_technology: 禁忌科技 involves manipulation of basic physical laws, considered dangerous by most civilizations

basic_geographical_environment.spatial_structure: The galaxy is divided into multiple stellar regions, 地球联合国 controls thousands of light-years around the Solar System, 人类联邦 controls the region centered on 天津四 on the other side of the galaxy

basic_geographical_environment.main_terrain_landforms: Diverse planetary surfaces, space environment is the main activity area

basic_geographical_environment.basic_climate_conditions: Climate largely determined by planetary geography and atmosphere, artificially controlled within space stations

basic_geographical_environment.core_resource_distribution: Rare elements and energy minerals are abundant in edge regions, becoming focuses of contention

civilization_system_basis.technological_level: Highly developed interstellar travel technology, wormhole jumps and warp drives coexist

civilization_system_basis.social_organization: 地球联合国 (federal bureaucratic system) and 人类联邦 (centralized military-political system) are independent but maintain diplomatic relations

civilization_system_basis.economic_system: Interstellar trade dominates, resource development and high-tech products are core trade goods

civilization_system_basis.political_system: 地球联合国 parliamentary system and 人类联邦 legion committee, different political ideologies cause frequent friction

civilization_system_basis.basic_transportation_communication: Wormhole network connects major star systems, sub-light speed travel connects secondary systems, hyperspace communication relies on relay station networks

individual_survival_basis.daily_necessities: 3D printing technology meets basic living needs, spacecraft and habitats are main residences

individual_survival_basis.basic_occupational_system: Astronauts, engineers, scientists are high-demand professions, space military personnel have prestigious status

individual_survival_basis.core_social_rules: Technical ability and adaptability are main standards for social evaluation, huge cultural differences between stellar regions

individual_survival_basis.life_death_patterns: Advanced medicine extends lifespan, but space environment challenges health, limited medical conditions in remote areas

core_cultural_elements.dominant_ideology: 地球联合国 advocates pluralism and inclusion, 人类联邦 emphasizes human-centrism

core_cultural_elements.basic_moral_principles: Survival of the fittest and collective interests are equally important, but the two powers have different emphases

core_cultural_elements.core_values: 地球联合国 values individual freedom, 人类联邦 values collective honor

core_cultural_elements.basic_language_script: Common Earth language is the official communication language, but each star system retains unique dialects

core_cultural_elements.key_taboos: 人类联邦 prohibits contact with specific alien species, 地球联合国 prohibits research on technology that disrupts spacetime structure

地球联合国.political_characteristics: Loose federal system, member star systems retain high autonomy, central power relatively weak

地球联合国.economic_model: Free trade, corporate groups have enormous influence, interstellar companies dominate the economy

地球联合国.cultural_characteristics: Diverse and inclusive, emphasizes individual rights, political correctness culture widespread

地球联合国.technological_direction: Focuses on applied technologies for quality of life and environmental harmony, leading in medical and information technology

地球联合国.military_situation: Dispersed military, well-equipped but lacks unified command, insufficient ability to respond to sudden crises

人类联邦.political_characteristics: Centralized military-political system, dual structure of legions and parliament, efficient but rigid

人类联邦.economic_model: State-led economy, powerful military-industrial complex, strong planned resource allocation

人类联邦.cultural_characteristics: Military worship, incorporating cultural elements from Han Empire and Roman Republic, distinct hierarchical concepts

人类联邦.technological_direction: Strong military and space technology, emphasizes practicality and self-sufficiency

人类联邦.military_situation: Possesses the strongest human fleet in the galaxy, well-trained, unified command, rich combat experience
